channel.title: Custom PvP
channel.description:
Please don't tell me I posted this in the wrong section, I know, but Downloads gets so many more views because of leechers, well here we go!
Pictures:
[URL=http://uppit.com/j9bwt4iqgtxv/pvp.jpg]pvp.jpg - 33 Kb[/URL]
[URL=http://uppit.com/kh1kdpjeh7ns/pvpp.jpg]pvpp.jpg - 32 Kb[/URL]
Working altar: (Under ObjectOption1.)
case 4008: if (p.skillLvl[5] != p.getLevelForXP(5)) { p.requestAnim(645, 0); p.skillLvl[5] = p.getLevelForXP(5); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You restore your prayer points."); } else { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Your prayer points are still full."); } p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, 5); p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; break;
Working Banks: (If the banks won't work. ObjectOption1)
case 2213://banks p.openBank(); break;
Npcs: (Under Build>Data>Npcs>NpcSpawn, your source might have a different work, it's under NpcSpawn.)
[PvP] spawn = 953 2903 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2904 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2905 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2906 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2907 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2908 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2909 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2910 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2911 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2912 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2913 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2914 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2915 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2916 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2917 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2918 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2919 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2920 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2921 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2922 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2923 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2924 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper spawn = 953 2925 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper
Thanks guys, please post a comment of what you think :D! P.S. I'm adding multi soon :]

item.title: Custom PvP
item.dc:creator: @Justin76 Justin76
item.description:
@Justin76 wrote:

Please don’t tell me I posted this in the wrong section, I know, but Downloads gets so many more views because of leechers, well here we go!

Pictures:

pvp.jpg - 33 Kb

pvpp.jpg - 32 Kb

Working altar:
(Under ObjectOption1.)

    case 4008:
		if (p.skillLvl[5] != p.getLevelForXP(5)) {
			p.requestAnim(645, 0);
			p.skillLvl[5] = p.getLevelForXP(5);
			p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You restore your prayer points.");
		} else {
			p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Your prayer points are still full.");
		}
		p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, 5);
		p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
		p.updateReq = true;
	break;

Working Banks:
(If the banks won’t work. ObjectOption1)

                             case 2213://banks
                             p.openBank();
                             break;

Npcs:
(Under Build>Data>Npcs>NpcSpawn, your source might have a different work, it’s under NpcSpawn.)

[PvP]
spawn = 953 2903 4438 4 2522 2519 2519 2521 Bank Keeper
